rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的血液检测技术带来了更灵敏、更早期癌症诊断的希望肿瘤不断地从垂死的细胞中脱落DNA，这些DNA在迅速分解之前会在患者的血液中短暂循环。许多公司已经创建了可以识别肿瘤 DNA 的血液测试，可能有助于医生诊断或监测癌症或选择治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/New-blood-test-technique-raises-hopes-for-more-sensitive-and-earlier-cancer-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/New-blood-test-technique-raises-hopes-for-more-sensitive-and-earlier-cancer-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a4ee5fb-6442-4947-9b2f-92fddac218db Thu, 18 Jan 2024 20:27:43 -0500 New blood test technique raises hopes for more sensitive and earlier cancer diagnosis
营养在抗击结核病中的关键作用：解决 N-AIDS 问题以获得更好的结果审查强调了营养性获得性免疫缺陷综合症（N-AIDS）在结核病（TB）管理中的关键作用，强调了结核病规划中综合营养筛查和护理的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Nutritions-pivotal-role-in-combating-tuberculosis-addressing-N-AIDS-for-better-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Nutritions-pivotal-role-in-combating-tuberculosis-addressing-N-AIDS-for-better-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2259c8f1-85ba-48e4-888e-b4bb67b09858 Thu, 18 Jan 2024 19:27:00 -0500 Nutrition's pivotal role in combating tuberculosis: addressing N-AIDS for better outcomes
全球死亡率趋势揭示了趋同俱乐部和不同模式研究分析了 1990 年至 2030 年的全球死亡率趋势，确定了具有相似死亡率特征的五个国家趋同俱乐部，揭示了死亡率和寿命的趋同和分化模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Global-mortality-trends-reveal-convergence-clubs-and-diverging-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Global-mortality-trends-reveal-convergence-clubs-and-diverging-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9faa43c4-69d7-43ba-a589-433c95f3e305 Thu, 18 Jan 2024 19:13:00 -0500 Global mortality trends reveal convergence clubs and diverging patterns
研究发现中年植物蛋白可提高健康衰老的机会《美国临床营养学杂志》上的一项研究表明，成年中期摄入较高的膳食蛋白质，尤其是植物蛋白，可以显着增加健康衰老的可能性，减少慢性疾病并改善身心健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Plant- Protein-in-midlife-boosts-chances-of-healthy-aging-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Plant- Protein-in-midlife-boosts-chances-of-healthy-aging-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=226b257c-2976-4c7f-89ed-5965196a0ab0 Thu, 18 Jan 2024 18:29:00 -0500 Plant protein in midlife boosts chances of healthy aging, study finds
St. Jude 宣布投资 1300 万美元，以扩大对 G 蛋白偶联受体的了解圣裘德儿童研究医院今天宣布投资近 1300 万美元，与哥伦比亚大学、杜克大学和斯坦福大学的科学家开展新的研究合作，以扩大对 G 蛋白偶联受体 (GPCR) 的了解，GPCR 是影响人类健康的重要蛋白质健康和疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/St-Jude-announces-2413-million-investment-to-expand-the-understanding-of-G- Protein- Coupled-receptors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/St-Jude-announces-2413-million-investment-to-expand-the-understanding-of-G- Protein- Coupled-receptors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ede8a9d3-a1b1-45f2-84b4-45e341e7c4c1 Thu, 18 Jan 2024 13:17:32 -0500 St. Jude announces $13 million investment to expand the understanding of G-protein coupled receptors
阿斯顿大学 ARCHA 获得 40 万英镑，用于招募四名博士生进行痴呆症研究阿斯顿大学阿斯顿老龄健康研究中心 (ARCHA) 已获得 40 万英镑的资金，用于招募四名博士生进行痴呆症研究项目。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/ARCHA-at-Aston-University-secures-c2a3400000-to-recruit-four-PhD-students-for-dementia-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/ARCHA-at-Aston-University-secures-c2a3400000-to-recruit-four-PhD-students-for-dementia-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f00e4426-1f06-4a17-a6ea-94d3d8e8413e Thu, 18 Jan 2024 12:07:27 -0500 ARCHA at Aston University secures £400,000 to recruit four PhD students for dementia research
关于产前接触有机磷酸酯如何影响儿童生长的新见解有机磷酸酯通常用作溴化阻燃剂的替代品，由于其在消费品中的使用，越来越多地出现在各种环境介质中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/New-insights-into-how-prenatal-exposure-to-organophosate-esters-affects-a-childs-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/New-insights-into-how-prenatal-exposure-to-organophosate-esters-affects-a-childs-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c37b3e8-4a4e-4e5d-b856-db5a6e99347c Thu, 18 Jan 2024 11:56:21 -0500 New insights into how prenatal exposure to organophosphate esters affects a child's growth
靶向 CD19 的脐带血 CAR NK 细胞疗法有望治疗 B 细胞恶性肿瘤患者德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员在一项 I/II 期试验中报告了有希望的结果，该试验对 37 名复发或难治性 B 细胞恶性肿瘤患者进行了治疗，这些患者接受了脐带血衍生的嵌合抗原受体 (CAR) 自然杀伤 (NK) 治疗针对 CD19 的细胞疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Cord-blood-driven-CAR-NK-cell-therapy-targeting-CD19-shows-promise-for-treating-病人-with-B-cell-恶性肿瘤.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Cord-blood-driven-CAR-NK-cell-therapy-targeting-CD19-shows-promise-for-treating-病人-with-B-cell-恶性肿瘤.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b455ab92-3cb0-4d8d-a978-f634aceaaf74 Thu, 18 Jan 2024 11:48:36 -0500 Cord blood-derived CAR NK cell therapy targeting CD19 shows promise for treating patients with B-cell malignancies
研究发现患有脑膜炎的儿童面临终身残疾三分之一患有细菌性脑膜炎的儿童因感染而患有永久性神经残疾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Children-battle-meningitis-face-lifelong-disability-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Children-battle-meningitis-face-lifelong-disability-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba088b33-f477-4fa0-9f43-e17def134cae Thu, 18 Jan 2024 11:34:02 -0500 Children battling meningitis face lifelong disability, study finds
了解医院获得性肺炎的抗菌药物耐药性已发表的新研究确定了更好地了解抗菌素耐药性 (AMR)，特别是医院获得性肺炎 (HAP) 方面的积极步骤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Understanding-antimicrobial-resistance-in-hospital-acquired-pneumonia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Understanding-antimicrobial-resistance-in-hospital-acquired-pneumonia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81faa15c-2099-41bd-a483-b70e6e94a6d5 Thu, 18 Jan 2024 11:25:46 -0500 Understanding antimicrobial resistance in hospital-acquired pneumonia
